explanation: [0-0] A brown-haired man is sitting at a wooden table holding a roll of aluminum foil. The background is a room with a purple wall, colorful drawers and white blinds.

[0-9] He then unrolls the aluminum foil in his hand, the roll rolling forward, and he raises his arms forward. Then the shot cuts, and there is a can of Coca-Cola on the unfolded aluminum foil. The brown-haired man wraps the aluminum foil around the can and presses it so that it completely covers the side of the can. He then shows the opening of the Coke to the camera, then flips the Coke over, pinches the aluminum foil into small pieces with a smile, and picks up the Coke from the side with his right hand, showing that it is undamaged. The index finger of his left hand is placed at the corner of his mouth.
